definition: fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Agalwood incense could make you feel calm, also can purify our magnetic field.
sentences.chinese: 沈香会让人有安定感，可以净化磁场。

definition: to burn incense at a temple
to go on a pilgrimage and offer incense (idiom)
the first stick of incense placed in the censer (believed to bring good luck esp. during festivities)/(slang) (Tw) the first reply to a blog post etc
(Buddhism) to initiate sb for monkhood or nunhood
Birthday of the Flowers, spring festival on lunar 12th or 15th February
Fayuan or Source of the Law temple in Beijing
